LanguageData.AAA_Embrausure.label: Embrasured gun
LanguageData.AAA_Embrausure.description: Allows you to build emrausured turrets.
LanguageData.AAA_Autocannon.label: auto cannon
LanguageData.AAA_Autocannon.description: Allows you to make Oerlikon 20mm gun and 40mm bofors.
LanguageData.AAA_MultipleAutocannon.label: dual auto cannon
LanguageData.AAA_MultipleAutocannon.description: Allows you to attach 2 autocannons to make a twin cannon.
LanguageData.AAA_QuadAutocannon.label: quadruple auto cannon
LanguageData.AAA_QuadAutocannon.description: Allows you to make a quad autocannon from 4 gun crates
LanguageData.AAA_Gatling.label: gatling guns
LanguageData.AAA_Gatling.description: Allows you to make CIWS turret and gatling guns.
